1.name: 1. Brady Bunch
1.description: The misadventures of a large family united when a widower and a widow marry.

2.name: 2. Midnight Cowboy
2.description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

3.name: 3. Easy Rider
3.description: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

4.name: 4. Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
4.description: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels..

5.name: 5. True Grit
5.description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

6.name: 6. Scooby Doo, Where Are You!
6.description: A group of teenage friends and their Great Dane (Scooby-Doo) travel in a bright green van solving strange and hilarious mysteries, while returning from or going to a regular teenage function.

7.name: 7. Age of Consent
7.description: Grizzled Australian painter Bradley Morahan decides to jolt his stale creativity by moving to a remote island on the Great Barrier Reef, where he takes on an alluring, uninhibited young woman named Cora as his muse.

8.name: 8. Sesame Street
8.description: On a special inner city street, the inhabitants, human and muppet, teach preschool subjects with comedy, cartoons, games, and songs.

9.name: 9. Support Your Local Sheriff!
9.description: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

10.name: 10. The Sinners
10.description: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter, Penelope, to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

11.name: 11. The Italian Job
11.description: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

12.name: 12. The Wild Bunch
12.description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

13.name: 13. On Her Majesty's Secret Service
13.description: British agent James Bond goes undercover to pursue the villainous Ernst Stavro Blofeld, who is planning to hold the world to ransom.

14.name: 14. Battle of Britain
14.description: In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.

15.name: 15. Hello, Dolly!
15.description: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

16.name: 16. Z
16.description: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

17.name: 17. Monty Python's Flying Circus
17.description: The original surreal sketch comedy showcase for the Monty Python troupe.

18.name: 18. Night Gallery
18.description: Rod Serling presents tales of horror illustrated in various paintings.

19.name: 19. Army of Shadows
19.description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

20.name: 20. The Benny Hill Show
20.description: A skit based show with Benny Hill, often containing smutty humour.

21.name: 21. Carry on Camping
21.description: Farcical misadventures by guests in an English holiday centre.

22.name: 22. Women in Love
22.description: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

23.name: 23. The Good Guys and the Bad Guys
23.description: Aging lawman Marshall Flagg and aging outlaw John McKay join forces when their respective positions in society are usurped by both a younger incompetent Marshal and young vicious gang leader Waco.

24.name: 24. Love Bug
24.description: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

25.name: 25. Hee Haw
25.description: Televised comedy/variety show with a country bent.
